text: Wiesław Ryszard Gołas (9 October 1930Wiesław Gołas at the FilmPolski.pl . Retrieved 2015-01-25. - 9 September 2021) was a Polish actor and Armia Krajowa's soldier. From 1970 to 1974, he starred in the comedy series Czterdziestolatek. He was born in Kielce, Poland. Gołas was cast in a role of Tomasz Czereśniak in a widely popular TV World War II series Czterej pancerni i pies. He has appeared in a number of movies including Ogniomistrz Kaleń (1961) and Dzięcioł (1970). Gołas died in Warsaw on 9 September 2021, exactly one month before his 91st birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Wiesław Gołas at the Culture.pl . Retrieved 2015-01-25. title: Wiesław Gołas
